alert.note: Alert for Butler; Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:57PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cowley and south central Butler Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 257 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atlanta, or 12 miles east of Douglass. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atlanta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
